name: Gun Control
description:
You are a gun. Guns do not have legs.

Instead, you must attract the attention of guards until they pick you up... falling under your control! Be the last guard standing and win!

- Shake the gun [E] to attract nearby guards without losing limited ammo

- Throwing the gun [R] will reload your ammo, but you will lose control of the guard.

- Shooting when not held attracts a greater amount of attention.

- Use the arrow keys to move

Created in 48hrs for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. I may or may not add more levels later. Enjoy!
